text: [Music]
today I've got what I believe to be a
tail samanage net first one of the
channels longest-running mysteries has
officially come to a close
you might recall the tale of a
mysterious hard drive found on reddit
and a user named Oh Vic if you don't you
should probably watch my other videos on
the topic but if you don't feel like it
here's a quick summary in 2011 a Reddit
user named secret HDD claimed that his
mother found a hard drive sewn into a
bag that they bought on eBay the hard
drive was broken unreadable but a user
named dobut claimed that they would be
able to fix it and retrieve the data
that was saved on it years passed
however and Dokic was never sent the
hard drive and eventually he just
disappeared
after my first video on the topic was
released
Dokic returned and was verified by a
reddit mod however his AMA yielded
little to no results outside the
revelation that he still had never
received the hard drive later on a
person claiming to be the original
secret HDD arrived being mocked
summarily by the reddit community and
the mod Desmodus however after
exchanging private DMS desmos was
convinced by the person they were in
fact the original secret HDD although he
never revealed the private details as to
why and that brings us to today if you
visited our slash tobik in the past week
you might have realized that posting was
turned off and pinned was opposed by the
mod des modes and in this post lies the
final true story of secret HDD confirmed
by the people involved and it also
contains a shocking or maybe not so
shocking revelation about dough Vic's
identity final post the dough big saga
hey all as an avid follower of the
Novak's egret HDD saga i like to lay to
rest what has been a very long series of
events I've now been given verifiable
proof of identities of two of the people
involved and traded facebook messages
with none other than Dilbeck himself the
whole thing's started with two dumb high
school freshmen in Minnesota apparently
there was an actual hard drive involved
but it was just taken from an old
computer at the school they thought it
would be fun to play a prank on reddit
and see what happened neither expected
it to get big when it got big the boy
with the account secret HDD who was more
of an avid Reddit user got scared the
boy with the accountant tobik started
getting ducks because he played a lot of
call of duty and his YouTube which had
some links to his identity became fairly
public information several of his IRL
friends got tagged and involved by Sluis
from the subreddit that freaked him out
and he deleted his reddit account and
this I believe is our first official
confirmation that dope it wasn't some
mysterious other entity with tools to
fix hard drives he was just the high
school kid who knew secret HDD the two
boys slowly separated in their own
social circles dough bik's family moved
away from minnesota in the middle of
their sophomore year of high school the
boys didn't really ever talk much the
owner of secret HDD forgot the password
they used when they created the account
literally at the school library the
subreddit continued on and persevered
through the years unfortunately one of
the mods early on ended up deleting
quite a bit of information that was on
the subreddit I inquired about becoming
a mod and was able to restore some of
them earlier this year I made contact
with what I thought was a troll account
but after quizzing for proof and
basically daxing him I was able to
confirm his story found dobut online
through his real identity and compared
some things he had DM does for his AMA
and had discourse which confirmed the
story des modes then follows up with
some of the most relevant links to the
story including the original post the
infamous daxing posts that scared dalvik
off of Reddit my first video on the
topic and the later AMAs both tobik and
secret HDD des modes then concluded with
his thoughts about the entire situation
I
the entire story of Dilbeck has been
amazing yes what started out as a troll
has led many of us to find courage in
the dov'è can realize that Doba kismet
dobut is an idea
dov'è kernel bond between all of us with
that said I think it's best for the
subreddit to no longer allow posting to
let it stand as a memorial for what we
have all gone through if someone would
like to start another subreddit where
you can discuss dobut please feel free
to maybe our slash dalvik meta anyway I
hope I'm able to provide some closure
for you much love to you all may the
dovahkiin with you brothers and sisters
and there you have it a keeper that has
lasted for nearly a decade finally comes
to an end also it appears that since I
started making this video our slash
Dilbeck has reopened submissions and the
final post is already not the final post
anymore and now with that all out of the
way we just got to get to the bottom of
that mysterious song if you don't know
what I'm talking about check out these
videos by
